title: Great News!! Tamilnadu is at the brink of eliminating elephantiasis
selftext:
Filariasis or elephantiasis is a parasitic disease caused by roundworms that are transmitted by the bites of infected mosquitoes. It is also known as lymphatic filariasis (LF) or elephantiasis. Filariasis is the second-largest cause of permanent disability worldwide, after leprosy. 

Let's congratulate the government's health policy that lead to this herculean fear.
